text: The WSG Open is a tournament for professional female tennis players played on outdoor clay courts. The event is classified as a $60,000 ITF Women's Circuit tournament and has been held in Warsaw, Poland, since 2017. == Past finals == === Singles === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Maja Chwalińska || Anastasiya Komardina || 6–3, 6–0 |- | 2018 || Olga Ianchuk || Victoria Bosio || 6–3, 4–6, 6–3 |- | 2017 || Martina Trevisan || Olga Ianchuk || 6–2, 6–4 |} === Doubles === {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Maja Chwalińska Ulrikke Eikeri || Weronika Falkowska Martyna Kubka || 6–4, 6–1 |- | 2018 || Maja Chwalińska Daria Kuczer || Martyna Kubka Stefania Rogozińska Dzik || 3–6, 7–6(7–5), [10–1] |- | 2017 || Priscilla Hon Vera Lapko || Katarzyna Kawa Katarzyna Piter || 7–6(7–3), 6–4 |} == External links == * * ITF search Category:ITF Women's Circuit Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2017 Category:Clay court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Poland
title: WSG Open
